title: lvl 21 Player with 7 ranked wins?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: A person on my friends list is lvl 21 but the LoL client displays him having seven wins why is this and how is this?

replies.body: Glitchy API. They probably level 30 and in placement matches for ranked.
Sometimes their lvl does not update for a while

Welcome to season 6, where everything is fuckedâ„¢

I regularly see people who show lv30 on the forums on mouse hover, and lv1 or lv14 or something in profile, or the reverse.
this is so weird though lol like come on rito
